column5: For your viewing pleasure while we wait for ice out in Algonquin..  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TwK0gYTzRz4  cheers HD
I learned something from watching it, a great way to handle feisty pike is to grab them in the eye sockets  very cool old footage, thanks
Thanks for the memories.....that was awesome!!
Thanks Fidel, I saw that many years ago, hadn't realized it was on youtube.  What a life that guy led!

I learned something from watching it, a great way to handle feisty pike is to grab them in the eye sockets  very cool old footage, thanks  Back in the day that was considered common practice..  Heck, my folks used to do the same..  Wouldn't handle a fish that way unless it was destined for the fryer though..

Thanks Fidel, I saw that many years ago, hadn't realized it was on youtube.  What a life that guy led!  Yep.  Classic video!!  Mr. Wulff was among the elitist for sure..  glad you guys liked it!  Maybe some day..
great video ... brings back memories of watching Curt Gowdy on American Sportsman
